function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on urban water cycle","Impact":"Risk of contamination of urban water supply, leading to increased spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular testing and monitoring of water supply for contaminants, implementation of water treatment technologies","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI for water quality monitoring","People":"Urban residents, public health organizations","Owner":"Water management authorities"},{"Description":"Data mining from sewers through digitalisation","Impact":"Potential exposure of workers to contaminated waste, spread of infectious diseases through sewer systems","Mitigation":"Automation of data collection, use of robotic systems for sewer inspection, proper training and protective equipment for workers","Technologies":"Robotic sewer inspection systems, automated data collection, protective equipment for workers","People":"Sewer maintenance workers, public health organizations","Owner":"Water management authorities, sewer maintenance companies"},{"Description":"Monitoring public health measures in sewers","Impact":"Inability to track the effectiveness of public health measures, potential for undetected spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of sewer data, analysis of trends and patterns to assess the impact of public health measures","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI for trend analysis","People":"Public health organizations, urban residents","Owner":"Water management authorities, public health organizations"}]}
